Package javelin

Class Debug

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.Debug
  • public class Debug
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of methods that can be altered to facilitate testing the game. Entry-points start with "on", such as oncampaignstart() and should never be called from other parts of the game unless Javelin.DEBUG is true. Other methods are helpers to be used within the class, such as #additems(Item[]). Ideally changes to this class should never be commited unless when expanding debug functionalities (such adding new entry or helper methods).

        public static java.lang.String onbattlehelp()

      • onworldhelp

        public static java.lang.String onworldhelp()
        Called from Help. Useful for making changes during the course of a game or testing sequence, since Javelin doesn't have a developer console for debugging purposes.
        Returns:
        Any text will be printed below the usual help output.
